data.title: United Arab Emirates dirham
data.meta_description: The Arab Emirates Dirham (; Arabic: درهم إماراتي, abbreviation: د.إ in Arabic, Dh and Dhs or DH in Latin; ISO code: AED is the official currency of the United Arab Emirates. The dirham is subdivided into 100 fils . It is pegged to the United States Dollar at a constant exchange rate of approximately 3.67 AED to 1 USD.
